casebody.data:
Munoz et al., Appellants, v. Nationwide Fire Mutual Insurance Company, Appellee.

[Cite as Munoz v. Nationwide Fire Mut. Ins. Co., 99 Ohio St.3d 291, 2003-Ohio-3628.]

(No. 2002-2054 Submitted June 3, 2003 Decided July 23, 2003.) Boyk & Crossmock, L.L.C., and Steven L. Crossmock, for appellant. Robison, Curphey & O’Connell, and Scott A. Haselman, for appellee.

{¶ 1} Proposition of Law No. 1 is dismissed on the authority of Hillyer v. State Farm Fire & Cas. Co., 97 Ohio St.3d 411, 2002-Ohio-6662, 780 N.E.2d 262.

{¶ 2} Proposition of Law No. 2 is dismissed, sua sponte, as having been improvidently allowed.

Moyer, C.J., F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton and O’Connor, JJ., concur. Resnick and O’Donnell, JJ., not participating.
